briefTitle: A Study on the Use of Tanakan® for Recovery of Neurological Impairment Following Ischaemic Stroke
officialTitle: A Phase III, Multicentre, Randomised, Double-blinded, Parallel Group, Placebo Controlled Clinical Study for Evaluating the Efficacy of EGb 761® (Tanakan®) (240mg) in the Recovery of Neurological Impairment Following Ischemic Stroke
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of Tanakan® 240mg in association with Acetylsalicylic acid (325mg/day) in the recovery of neurological impairment following ischemic stroke.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With Modified Rankin Score of Less Than 3 at the End of Study Period.
